title: Light Christmas Pudding
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened plus extra for greasing', '110g soft light brown sugar', '2 large eggs, beaten', '175g self-raising flour, sifted', '1/4 rounded teaspoon ground mace', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'grated rind 1 small lemon', 'grated rind 1 small orange', '1 medium cooking apple, peeled, cored and chopped small', '3 rounded tablespoons mincemeat', 'glace cherries, chopped']
